Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Pepsi gave Black Lives Matter a hundred million dollars when there is no evidence to support this.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or confirmation that Pepsi made any donation to Black Lives Matter.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Pepsi has not contributed to the Black Lives Matter organization, as confirmed by a spokesperson for Pepsi.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Pepsi gave money to Black Lives Matter based on false information circulated on social media.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by relying on false information initially reported by Lou Dobbs on Fox Business and not acknowledging the correction issued by Dobbs.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation bias in the provided claim.
